metadata.name: la haute reine en rouge
metadata.description:
She watched from a top-floor balcony as the morning commute trotted in and out of the metro entrance on the quiet avenue below. 

Some passed without notice, but others felt a gravitational urge to gaze upwards. 

The creamy art deco façade. The blue sky reflected in the windows. That brilliant and bold red dress.

Her presence felt unreal... like a dream or a scene from classic cinema. But this was no dream - this was her reality. A queen in her element.

La haute reine en rouge.

•••

50% of sale proceeds will be donated to The Collective Identity. An LA-based a non-profit charity which supports black women with mentorship programs.  (https://www.thecollectiveidentity.org/)
